q: '' Dwaine Caraway said. It came up that Kiss lead singer Gene Simmons got a key to the city last week for supporting the troops. Dwaine Caraway said that supports him giving a key to Michael Vick . He is supporting the troops, I am supporting the children, he said. Dwaine Caraway gave Michael Vick the key during an event at Club Cirque that was attended by children who came to hear Michael Vick 's story. Dwaine Caraway said he would do it all over again

Chris Bryant, who believes he may have been a victim of the phone hackers, said Friday he welcomed the decision to re-examine the case, adding that it should not have been closed last month. The evidence that this goes far deeper than one rotten apple has continued to stack up, and so a fresh pair of eyes looking at the case is very welcome, he said. Bryant said the police had`` severely'' damaged their credibility by failing to properly investigate earlier. Andy Coulson and the News of The World have denied the charges. MENTAL

, his family, and his brilliant and dedicated team the very best for what I'm sure will be a long and successful future in Government. And here's the full statement from David Cameron : I am very sorry that Andy Coulson has decided to resign as my Director of Communications, although I understand that the continuing pressures on him and his family mean that he feels compelled to do so. Andy Coulson has told me that the focus on him was impeding his ability to do his job and was starting to prove a distraction for the Government. During his time working for me, Andy Coulson has carried out his role with complete professionalism. He has been a brilliant member of my team and has thrown himself at the job with skill and dedication. He
